name: Earthen Harmony
description: Earth Shield healing is increased by 300% if your Earth Shield target is below 50% health, and Healing Wave adds a stack of Earth Shield to your target, up to 9 maximum stacks.

name: Primal Tide Core
description: Every 4 casts of Riptide also applies Riptide to another friendly target near your Riptide target.

name: Spiritwalker's Tidal Totem
description: After using Mana Tide Totem, the cast time of Healing Wave and Chain Heal is reduced by 50%, and the mana cost of Chain Heal and Healing Wave is reduced by 100% for 10 sec.

name: Jonat's Natural Focus
description: Healing Wave and Healing Surge increase the healing done by your next Chain Heal by 0%, stacking up to 0 times.

name: Primal Lava Actuators
description: Each time Flame Shock deals Periodic damage, increase the damage of your next Lava Lash by 10% and reduce the cooldown of Lava Lash by 0.5 sec.

name: Witch Doctor's Wolf Bones
description: Increases the chance to gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon by 5%, and whenever you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon, the cooldown of Feral Spirits is reduced by 2.0 sec.

name: Legacy of the Frost Witch
description: Consuming 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon will reset the cooldown of Stormstrike and cause your next Stormstrike to deal 100% increased damage.

name: Doom Winds
description:
Dropping Windfury Totem grants you 100% inceased chance to gain Windfury Weapon for 8 sec. 

This can only occur once every 1 min.

name: Windspeaker's Lava Resurgence
description:
When you cast Earth Shock

<condition>Elemental Blast</condition>
<dynamic>or Elemental Blast</dynamic>

, gain Lava Surge and increase the damage of your next Lava Burst by 30%.

name: Echoes of Great Sundering
description:
When you cast Earth Shock

<condition>Elemental Blast</condition>
<dynamic>or Elemental Blast</dynamic>

, your next Earthquake will deal 250% additional damage.

name: Elemental Equilibrium
description: Dealing direct Fire damage increases the damage of your next Frost spell by 30%. Dealing Frost damage increases the damage of your next Nature spell by 25%. Dealing Nature damage increases the damage of your next Fire spell by 20%.

name: Skybreaker's Fiery Demise
description:
Flame Shock damage over time critical strikes reduce the cooldown of 

<condition>Storm Elemental</condition>
<dynamic>Storm Elemental</dynamic>

Fire Elemental by 

<condition>Storm Elemental</condition>
<dynamic>1.0</dynamic>

1.0 sec, and Flame Shock has a 30% increased critical strike chance.

name: Chains of Devastation
description: Casting Chain Heal makes your next Chain Lightning instant cast. Casting Chain Lightning makes your next Chain Heal instant cast.

name: Deeply Rooted Elements
description:
<spec>Enhancement</spec>
<dynamic>Using</dynamic>

<spec>Elemental</spec><spec>Restoration</spec>
<dynamic>Casting</dynamic>

 

<spec>Restoration</spec>
<dynamic>Riptide</dynamic>

<spec>Elemental</spec>
<dynamic>Lava Burst</dynamic>

<spec>Enhancement</spec>
<dynamic>Stormstrike</dynamic>

 has a 5% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

name: Deeptremor Stone
description: Earth Elemental has a permanent Earthquake attached to it.

name: Ancestral Reminder
description:
<condition>Heroism</condition>
<dynamic>Heroism</dynamic>

Bloodlust or any similar effects last an additional 20.0 sec on you, and you gain an extra 10% Haste from any 

<condition>Heroism</condition>
<dynamic>Heroism</dynamic>

Bloodlust type effect.
